author: John Duffy
text:
The Task Force is developing a Best Practices Report on the topic of manager evaluations.  The report will be available for use by local governments. Your participation will provide the task force with important information as it develops its recommendations and report.  Completing the questionnaire will only take about 10 minutes.
Please take a moment and complete the survey questionnaire which is accessed at the following link:
https://www.surveymonkey.com/s/LFXFXJ9
Thank you in advance for completing the questionnaire.
title: The ICMA Task Force on Manager Evaluations seeks your input!
